data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chatzimanolis, Stylianos, Caron, Edilson (2016): New species and synonymies in Xenopygus Bernhauer (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini). Zootaxa 4200 (1): 131-142, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4200.1.5|58 occurrences
